title: Job search - the interview (Captioned)
creator_credit: Australia. Dept. of Employment, Education and Training
brief_description: This second part of the Job Search series shows three school leavers in an interview and summarises their performance. The successful person is not revealed, leaving this factor open to follow-up group discussion.
